> Nightstrike get stuck and stunned started to fall but pressed some 
> but=
tons while he try to do a forced landing.
Legacy stopped firing for a momen=
t as he noted Nightstrike's cessation of fire. He tilted his head slightly =
as his sensors scanned him, assesing the situation. With a slight flicker o=
f his single optic he shifts form, his armor rearranging itself as he assum=
ed his futuristic tank mode. 
"IT WOULD APPEAR THAT THE MINION CALLED NIGHT=
STRIKE HAS BEEN TEMPORARILLY DISABLED. I WILL FINISH HIM." Legacy transmitt=
ed to Lord Elder as he began moving towards Nightstrike's position, the mai=
n cannon glowing crimson as it came online, as he searched out the temporar=
illy stunned=A0Nightstrike.
Preston
(Legacy)
